khurana

Class MainInputOutput1

  • java.lang.Object
    • khurana.MainInputOutput1

  • public class MainInputOutput1
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Harkirat Khurana This is the main class of this project. In this class, the following tasks are completed: -Adding a new contestant -Deleting one/more than one contestant(s) -Searching for a contestants profile -Loading an already made file made of contestnts' information -Saving the contestants' inforamtion into a new file

      • addContestant

        public static void addContestant(ContestantInformation contestant1,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<ContestantInformation> contestants,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<Label> label,
                                 int contestantNum,
                                 int question)
        Checks if the applicant is older than 18 years and if he/she got the security question right. If any of the 2 conditions are not met, the applicant wont be added as a contestant
        Parameters:
        contestant1 - Age used from this determine if the applicant is old enough to apply
        contestants - contestant1 to be added to this arraylist
        label - An object of the Label class whihc is used to print the contestants' information
        contestantNum - used to add the contestant at the appropriate index
        question - used to determine it the user is smart and/or if this a bot
